# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="f0c87-102">Cum de a găsi opţiuni în setările de Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0c87-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0c87-103">În partea de sus a paginii, selectaţi pictograma unelte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0c87-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f0c87-104">pentru a deschide setările.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0c87-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f0c87-105">În partea de jos a panoului de setări, selectaţi [**toate setările de Outlook**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0c87-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f0c87-106">Acest lucru va arăta General dvs., E-mail, Calendar, şi (dacă este cazul) Premium setările şi opţiunile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f0c87-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
